page.title: 04 My House.
page.content: My house is a detached house.It is No.4 Orchard Rise,it is about 10 to 20 years old (I think).It has got a front and back garden.The back is bigger than the front plus it has got a patio,garage, green-house and shed too.Our house has got nine rooms which are:Kitchen, dining-room,toilet,lounge,Mum and Dads room,my brothers and my bedroom, bathroom and playroom.My room is at the front of the house and the wall is ment to be pink but instead it is covered in pictures and posters of horses.We have got quite a bit of furniture.In my room I've got a bedroom unit,bed,chair,desk and a table too.
